ability.mineminenomi.true_gear_second.de: By speding up their blood flow, the user gains strength, speed and mobility
ability.mineminenomi.gear_fifth.descript: Awakening ability, that makes you insanely powerful
ability.mineminenomi.true_gomu_gomu_no_g: Rapidly punches enemies using rubber fists
ability.mineminenomi.true_gomu_gomu_no_p: The user stretches their arm to hit the opponent
ability.mineminenomi.true_gomu_gomu_no_r: Stretches towards a block, then launches the user on an arch depending on where they fist landed
ability.mineminenomi.strong_gomu_gomu_no: Almost same as simple pistol... until You get Haki
text.mineminenomi.too_weak: You are to weak to use this ability
text.mineminenomi.too_heavy: You are to heavy to use this ability
ability.mineminenomi.true_gear_fourth.de: The user inflates their muscle structure to tremendously increase the power of their attacks and also allows flight  §2Uses Haki§r
ability.mineminenomi.gomu_fusen.descript: By inhaling a lot of air user inflates their chest to gain invunerability to canon balls
ability.mineminenomi.true_gear_third.des: By blowing air and inflating their bones, the user's attacks get bigger and gain incredible strength
ability.mineminenomi.true_gomu_gomu_no_b: Hits the enemy with both hands to launch them away
item.mineminenomi.hito_hito_no_mi_model_: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika
